bioconda.name: bioconductor-vsn
bioconda.summary: Variance stabilization and calibration for microarray data

biotools.summary: The package implements a method for normalising microarray intensities, and works for single- and multiple-color arrays. It can also be used for data from other technologies, as long as they have similar format.

bioschemas.name: vsn
bioschemas.summary: The package implements a method for normalising microarray intensities, and works for single- and multiple-color arrays. It can also be used for data from other technologies, as long as they have similar format.
